alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 12:50PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Piscataquis County through 130 PM EDT... At 1250 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Brownville Junction, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover-Foxcroft, Guilford, Brownville Junction, Milo, Orneville, Ebeemee, Lake View Plantation, Brownville, Sebec, Atkinson, Medford, Willimantic, Bowerbank, Lake View, Barnard, Katahdin Iron Works and Williamsburg. This includes State Highway 11 between Milo and Brownville Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
